#summary String provider allowing you to select from a comma-delimited list.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

This plugin provides a single StringProvider that allows for a list comma seperated strings to be passed to it. The list is parsed and presented to the user as a listbox from which one value may be picked. The picked value is then returned.

= Installation =

Installation instructions can be found on the InstallInstructions page.
